The following lists provide links to the Dashboard Summary web pages developed by MCOE based for Level 2 support based on data from CDE. For last year's webpages, please see <https://da-monterey.netlify.app/>

```{r}
#| include: false


library(MCOE)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)



dash.mry.da.details <- read_rds("dash_mry_da_details.rds")

da.dists <- dash.mry.da.details %>% 
    select(cds) %>%
    unique() %>%
    unlist()



index.tbl <- tibble(cds = da.dists) %>%
    rowwise() %>%
    mutate(dist.name = mcoe_name(cds),
           url = paste0("<a href='","https://montereydashboard2023.netlify.app/output/","dashboard2023summary", cds, ".html","'>","https://montereydashboard2023.netlify.app/output/","dashboard2023summary", cds, ".html","</a>"  ) ) %>%
    select(-cds)

# atsi.cde.mry.michelle <- read_rds("atsi list michelle.rds")



essa_mry <- read_rds("essa_mry.rds")

essa.tbl <- essa_mry %>%
    select(cds,districtname, schoolname, AssistanceStatus2023) %>%
    mutate(url = paste0("<a href='","https://montereydashboard2023.netlify.app/output/","DashboardSummary", cds, ".html","'>","https://montereydashboard2023.netlify.app/output/","DashboardSummary", cds, ".html","</a>"  ) )


```

::: panel-tabset
## DA Districts

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

datatable(index.tbl,
          colnames = c("District", "URL"),
          caption = "List of Districts in Differentiated Assistance (DA)",
          rownames = FALSE,
          options = list(lengthChange = FALSE,
                         searching = TRUE),
       escape = FALSE) 


```

## CSI/ATSI Schools

The following lists provide links to the Dashboard Summary web pages developed by MCOE based for CSI/ATSI support based on data from CDE.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

datatable(essa.tbl,
          colnames = c("CDS", "District", "School","URL"),
          caption = "List of Schools in CSI and ATSI",
          rownames = FALSE,
          options = list(lengthChange = FALSE,
                         searching = TRUE),
       escape = FALSE)


```
